A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I bumped this up half a star* because I feel like this movie is suffering from Star Wars fatigue\, or something. It seems like people are falling all over themselves to hate it for some reason I can't quite figure out. Don't get me wrong\, it's not going to change your life. It's not the best thing ever. But it's competent\, fun\, and as about as good a Star Wars movie as I think we can hope for at this stage.\n\n*I then bumped it right back down half a star because of the disservice I feel it does to at least one character. I really feel like that charcter deserved better\, and more thoughtful treatment\, and that it was a serious misstep.
